product.title: The Jungle Book 2 | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Jungle Book 2

In this long-awaited sequel to the acclaimed Jungle Book debut, Mowgli is trying to get acclimated to the Man Village after years of living with his jungle friends. When he decides to return to the jungle for a visit with his old friend Baloo, his new friend Shanti is concerned and follows him. When Mowgli realizes his antics have put Shanti in danger, he’s faced with a tough decision: returning to his exciting life with Baloo and his jungle friends or living a safe, simple life with Shanti back in the Man Village.

Tie-in Activity: Stage your own jungle safari by exploring a nature center or forest near your home. Ask your child to point out animals, bugs, and other interesting things he sees, keeping in mind that some plants can pose a hazard and should be avoided. If you don't have easy access to either of those places, print out photos of interesting jungle dwellers and create a jungle in your very own living room for them to explore.
